Class CompoundTask

java.lang.Object
AbstractTask
CompoundTask
public class CompoundTask extends AbstractTask

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CompoundTask(String title, String description, boolean isComplete, DateAndTimeCombo startDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo dueDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo completionDateAndTime)
    Creates an instance of CompoundTask, initializing a SimpleTask array of size 10 to store subtasks required to complete CompoundTask.
    CompoundTask(String title, String description, DateAndTimeCombo startDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo dueDateAndTime)
    Overloaded constructor that creates an instance of CompoundTask, initializing a SimpleTask array of size 10 to store subtasks required to complete CompoundTask, and automatically sets isComplete to false and completionDateAndTime to null.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompoundTask

      public CompoundTask(String title, String description, boolean isComplete, DateAndTimeCombo startDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo dueDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo completionDateAndTime)
      Creates an instance of CompoundTask, initializing a SimpleTask array of size 10 to store subtasks required to complete CompoundTask.
      Parameters:
      title - Name of CompoundTask
      description - Detailed summary of the CompoundTask
      isComplete - Indicates if a task has been completed
      startDateAndTime - Instance of DateAndTimeCombo representing start date and time of CompoundTask
      dueDateAndTime - Instance of DateAndTimeCombo representing due date and time of CompoundTask
      completionDateAndTime - Instance of DateAndTimeCombo representing date and time CompoundTask was completed.
      Precondition: 
      title is a String, description is a String, isComplete is boolean, startDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo, dueDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo, completionDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo

    • CompoundTask

      public CompoundTask(String title, String description, DateAndTimeCombo startDateAndTime, DateAndTimeCombo dueDateAndTime)
      Overloaded constructor that creates an instance of CompoundTask, initializing a SimpleTask array of size 10 to store subtasks required to complete CompoundTask, and automatically sets isComplete to false and completionDateAndTime to null.
      Parameters:
      title - Name of CompoundTask
      description - Detailed summary of the CompoundTask
      startDateAndTime - Instance of DateAndTimeCombo representing start date and time of CompoundTask
      dueDateAndTime - Instance of DateAndTimeCombo representing due date and time of CompoundTask
      Precondition: 
      title is a String, description is a String, startDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo, dueDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo

      public void addSubtask(SimpleTask subtask)
      Method that adds a subtask to the SimpleTask array.
      Parameters:
      subtask - Instance of SimpleTask to be added to subtasks array.
      Precondition: 
      subtask instance of SimpleTask
      Postcondition:
      this.getNumberOfSubtasks() == old.getNumberOfSubtasks() + 1

      public SimpleTask getSubtask(int index)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      SimpleTask stored in SimpleTask array.
      Precondition: 
      index invalid input: '<'= 10

    • complete

      public void complete(DateAndTimeCombo completionDateAndTime)
      Overridden method from AbstractTask class that sets CompoundTask as complete after checking for completion of all subtasks associated with CompoundTask, as well as setting the completion date and time for CompoundTask.
      Specified by:
      complete in class AbstractTask
      Parameters:
      completionDateAndTime - New completion date and time of CompoundTask.
      Precondition: 
      completionDateAndTime instance of DateAndTimeCombo
      Postcondition:
      this.getCompletionDateAndTime() != null

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overridden toString() method to print information about CompoundTask including title, description, number of subtasks, start date and time, due date and time, and if the task is complete. If task is complete, it will print completion date and time of CompoundTask. If all subtasks are not completed, will ask user to complete all subtasks before continuing.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String of relevant information related to CompoundTask.
